DESCRIPTION: #yUnplayable #yRetaining cards. The leftmost Trap in your hand is triggered when you lose HP. If from an enemy attack, targets the attacker.
Enemies with Maledict take #b50% more non-attack damage.
While Drained, you deal #b25% less non-attack damage.
Whenever an enemy doesn't attack, deals damage. Deals half damage against attacks with other effects.
Enemies affected by Venom lose #b2 HP whenever they take damage.
#yBlock is not removed at the start of your turn.
Prevents the next time you would lose HP.
Constricted creatures take damage at the END of their turn.
Effect applies during Boss and Elite combats.
Snared creatures deal less damage until after their next attack.
